details.description:
The adidas Yeezy Slide Slate Grey is a collaboration between adidas and Kanye West.
​
​The Slide Slate Grey adidas Yeezy comes in a slate grey color palette. The shoe features an upper constructed from a single piece of molded EVA foam, offering a lightweight and durable design. The slide's design features strategic cutouts and a breathable lining. The slide's outsole features a textured pattern that provides traction and stability. The Yeezy Slide features an effortless slip-on design for easy wear and removal.
​
​What we love about the adidas Yeezy Slide Slate Grey is its minimalist and sleek design. The slide is crafted with a one-piece construction, featuring a soft and comfortable foam compound for the upper, while the Slate Grey colorway adds a versatile and understated aesthetic. The adidas Yeezy Slide Slate Grey was released in 2023, and sold for a retail price of $70.

First revealed in February 2022 at the Donda 2 listening event in Miami, the adidas Yeezy Slide Onyx features an all-black foam construction with a soft footbed for comfort. At the base, a grooved outsole adds stability and responsiveness.

The adidas Yeezy Slide Onyx released in March of 2022 and retailed for $60.

The adidas Yeezy Slide in Slate Marine showcases an unprecedented combination of style and comfort. The slate marine colorway released on August 11, 2023. A deviation from the norm, this slide presents a sculpted yet sleek design, dominated by a bold, Slate Marine hue.

This slide comes dressed in a captivating Slate Marine color scheme. The minimalistic approach creates a modern silhouette that's both trendy and comfortable. The slides feature a characteristic adidas marking on the footbed, as well as the Yeezy imprint subtly incorporated, adding a splash of exclusivity to your step.

What we love about the Yeezy Slide design is the cloud-like cushioning that effortlessly molds to your foot, offering an unparalleled comfort experience. This cool slide effortlessly blends comfort with chic aesthetics. The adidas Yeezy Slide in Slate Marine was launched on August 11, 2023, retailing at a cool $70.

Step into unparalleled comfort and minimalist style with the adidas Yeezy Slide Dark Onyx. This sleek, monochromatic slide is the epitome of understated luxury, featuring a uniform dark onyx colorway that pairs effortlessly with any casual outfit. The Yeezy Slide's design focuses on simplicity and functionality, offering a sophisticated take on casual footwear.

Crafted for those who value both style and comfort, the adidas Yeezy Slide Dark Onyx is built with a plush material that molds to the shape of your foot, ensuring all-day comfort. Its minimalist aesthetic is complemented by the slide's practicality, making it the perfect choice for a relaxed day out or a cozy evening at home. The adidas Yeezy Slide has quickly become a staple in the wardrobe of the fashion-forward, thanks to its versatile design and unparalleled comfort.

Since its release on March 7, 2024, with a retail price of $70, the adidas Yeezy Slide Dark Onyx has established itself as a must-have for sneaker enthusiasts and style mavens alike. Its release has been met with enthusiasm, solidifying its status as a timeless piece of casual footwear. If you're seeking a blend of simplicity, comfort, and style, the adidas Yeezy Slide Dark Onyx is a choice that delivers on all fronts.

The adidas Yeezy Slide redefines cozy footwear, this time in the fresh Granite colorway. Released on August 25, 2023, the Yeezy slide continues to prove that less truly is more. Drawing inspiration from modern design the Yeezy Slide's aesthetic is top-tier.
​​
​Molded with a smooth, soft-to-touch finish, the sculpted look elevates every casual outfit. Ditching the conventional, this slide is made from slick, EVA and rubber, creating a one-piece design that graces the entire silhouette. The neutral granite hue is minimalistic perfection, blending effortlessly with every style and season.​
​​
​Highlighting the contoured footbed for that ultra-comfort feeling, it's all about slipping into luxury and making a statement. Whether it's beach days or city strolls, elevate the vibe with these slides. The adidas Yeezy Slide in Granite made its mark on August 25, 2023, with an attainable retail price of $70.

The Yeezy Slide in Azure hit the scene on May 31, 2023. Born from the innovative partnership of adidas and Yeezy, reshaping the way we see casual footwear. These slides have it all - style, comfort, and a nod to the bold.

Adorned in a vibrant Azure hue, they are a celebration of color and a symbol of fearless style. The sleek EVA foam design offers more than just a unique aesthetic. It provides comfort that complements your daily hustle or chill out sessions equally. It's more than a slide. It's a statement. It's an ethos that embraces individuality and blurs the line between loungewear and streetwear.

With the adidas Yeezy Slide Azure, released at a retail price of $70, stepping into style has never been this effortless.

DISCLAIMER: US and UK sizing is the same and does not require any conversion.
The adidas Yeezy Slide Bone (Restock Pair) features a slightly different composition than the original adidas Yeezy Slide Bone that debuted in the fall of 2019. Instead of a smooth EVA foam construction, it has a pebbled, more textural touch. At the base, a grooved sole and cushioned footbed completes the design.

The adidas Yeezy Slide Bone (Restock Pair) released in May of 2022 and retailed for $60.

To shop the original adidas Yeezy Slide Bone, click here.

Enter the realm of sleek minimalism with the adidas Yeezy Slide Salt, a silhouette that redefines casual footwear. Embracing a monochromatic salt hue, this slide is a testament to the idea that true sophistication lies in simplicity. Designed with a smooth, seamless construction, the Yeezy Slide Salt offers an uncluttered, organic aesthetic that's as tranquil as its namesake.

The Yeezy Slide in Salt is crafted from a unique foam compound that blends lightweight comfort with durability, these slides are tailored for the trendsetters who seek to merge their laid-back lifestyles with high-fashion sensibilities. The soft, cushioned footbed conforms to your foot, making every step feel like a cloud—a testament to adidas and Yeezy's pursuit of innovation in comfort and design.

Having graced the market on March 15, 2024, and with a price tag of $70, the adidas Yeezy Slide Salt swiftly became the go-to choice for those who covet a fusion of luxe and leisure. Its release is celebrated as the moment when adidas and Yeezy once again elevated the everyday to the extraordinary. For the aficionados of minimalist chic, the adidas Yeezy Slide Salt has set a new benchmark in effortless style.

The adidas Yeezy Slide Flax is a slip on that takes on a minimalist design and is available in a monochromatic finish in dark beige or Flax color.

The Slide Flax by Yeezy for adidas is made from injected EVA material, and the sandal takes the shape of a one-piece mold. The construction is lightweight with foam compounds for cushioning. The same material extends underfoot, where the slide has a series of horizontal grooves for traction.

The adidas Yeezy Slide Flax was first released on the 22nd of August 2022, with an initial retail price set at $70. The adidas Yeezy Slide Flax was released again on the 20th of March 2024, with a retail price set at $70.

name: adidas Yeezy Slide Glow Green (2022/2023 Restock)

details.description:
DISCLAIMER: US and UK sizing is the same and does not require any conversion.
The Yeezy Slide Glow (2022 Restock) arrives as a more vibrant variation of the 2021 Yeezy Slide Glow. It is constructed with a Glow EVA foam for comfort and responsiveness. A grooved outsole adds proper traction for daily wear.

The Yeezy Slide Glow (2022 Restock) released in May of 2022 and retailed for $60.

The adidas Yeezy Slide Dark Onyx (Kids) is a child-sized version of the signature Yeezy Slide in a monotone colorway with no accent colors.

This slide has a unibody build, which means it’s made from one piece of injected EVA foam. This material is both lightweight and durable but appears hefty. The open-toe design allows air to circulate through the slide and keeps the foot from feeling confined. Sticking to its Yeezy roots, the slide boasts a minimalist silhouette and subdued branding details. For example, a debossed adidas logo can be found on the soft footbed. Something that makes this shoe stand out is the oversized, serrated outsole, which is also made of EVA foam. It provides traction while contrasting the smooth upper.

Our StockX experts like the way the slide turns up at the toe. The kid-sized adidas Yeezy Slide Dark Onyx (Kids) was released on March 7th, 2024, and retailed at $50.

DISCLAIMER: US and UK sizing is the same and does not require any conversion.
The adidas Yeezy Slide Pure (Restock Pair) features a slightly different composition than the original adidas Yeezy Slide Pure that debuted in the spring of 2021. Instead of a smooth EVA foam construction, it has a pebbled, more textural touch. At the base, a grooved sole and cushioned footbed completes the design.

The adidas Yeezy Slide Pure (Restock Pair) released in December of 2021 and retailed for $60.

To shop the original adidas Yeezy Slide Pure, click here.

The adidas Yeezy Slide Resin (2022/2024) is the result from a collaboration between American rapper Kanye West´s brand and German sport and lifestyle manufacturer adidas.

The Resin Slide is crafted from injected-molded EVA foam. The one-piece build sandal features a pale green finish throughout the lightly textured exterior. Branding is displayed on a tonal adidas logo debossed on the soft footbed. Underfoot, deep horizontal ridges cut throughout the sandal outsole, resulting in an sawtooth pattern for grip.

The adidas Yeezy Slide Resin (2022/2024) was first released on the 24th of September 2022, and originally had a retail price of $70.

The adidas Yeezy Slide Slate Grey (Kids), in kids sizes, is an athletic slide shoe featuring a chunky, singular silhouette. Fabricated from injected EVA foam, the Yeezy slide offers the comfort of a wide strap aesthetic with a seamless construction that highlights the monochrome Slate Grey palette. adidas three stripes branding appears on the footbed, and the grooved outsole offers traction.

Launching in 2015 with a fashion show, American rapper and producer Kanye West collaborated with German sportswear giant adidas to create the Yeezy collection of shoes. With Yeezy, Kanye West presided over the designs with full creative control of the product design. The result was a series of functional sneakers and lifestyle shoes with an aesthetic that is a marked departure from adidas’ heritage styles, showcasing the power of innovation within collaboration.

Our experts feel that the best feature of the Yeezy Slide is its simplicity, which makes the shoe both stylish and wearable. The adidas Yeezy Slide Slate Grey (Kids) released on June 10, 2024, and retailed at $50.

The adidas Yeezy Slide Ochre is constructed entirely of EVA foam in a monochromatic fashion. A soft footbed offers immediate step-in comfort for daily wear. From there, deep groove treads on the sole provide traction and support.

The adidas Yeezy Slide Ochre released in December of 2021 and retailed for $60.

DISCLAIMER: US and UK sizing is the same and does not require any conversion.

The adidas Yeezy Slide Pure is constructed of Pure EVA foam with a soft footbed that offers an immediate step in comfort. An outsole with accentuated grooves for traction and support adds the finishing touches to the design.

The adidas Yeezy Slide Pure released in April of 2021 and retailed for $60.
DISCLAIMER: US and UK sizing is the same and does not require any conversion.

Constructed of bright Glow Green EVA foam, the adidas Yeezy Slide Glow Green provides lightweight durability with a luminous look. From there, strategic groove placement on the underfoot enhances traction and comfort.

The adidas Yeezy Slide Glow Green released in September of 2021 and retailed for $60.

Unveiled on August 3, 2023, the adidas Yeezy 450 Slide is the next evolution of the iconic Yeezy line, taking strides into new design territories.

Defying traditional aesthetics, the Yeezy 450 Slide presents an unorthodox, avant-garde silhouette that instantly captures attention. Its meticulously engineered, one-piece design showcases an extraordinary visual dynamic. Crafted for comfort, the slides provide a snug, tailored fit for those who live life on the move.

The adidas Yeezy 450 Slide dares to defy norms and set new trends. This model was released to the world on August 3, 2023, with an attainable retail price of $110.

The adidas Yeezy Slide Onyx (Infant) does not have any laces or an ankle strap, but rather stays on the foot through one thick strap.

The sole of the adidas Yeezy Slide Onyx Infants is designed to provide ultimate comfort and traction so the wearer can move as easily as possible. The entire body of the shoe is constructed from one piece of EVA foam composite. The material has a rough finish that allows for more grip when they are being worn.

The adidas Yeezy Slide Onyx (Infant) were first introduced in May of 2022. The starting retail price at the time of its release was $70.
